      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawChart(Proces[] procesi)
      Draws Gantt chart with data calculated with simulate()
      void generateData(android.view.View view)
      Generates random data for algorithm simulation if option is true or fills user provided data into processesArray Number of processes are read from this view for each process priority random values are generated call to Priority_Process constructor StartTime ,Priority if needed and duration are generated at random

      After the data is setup simulate() is called inside a try block

      void simulate()
      Call respective Algorithm handling methods based on currently selected algorithm Methods used for calculation are in PomozneMetode class when finished calls drawChart with the calculated data

      • generateData

        public void generateData(android.view.View view)
        Generates random data for algorithm simulation if option is true or fills user provided data into processesArray Number of processes are read from this view for each process priority random values are generated call to Priority_Process constructor StartTime ,Priority if needed and duration are generated at random

        After the data is setup simulate() is called inside a try block

      • drawChart

        public void drawChart(Proces[] procesi)
        Draws Gantt chart with data calculated with simulate()
        Parameters:
        procesi - Array of Process objects containing data to visualize in Gantt chart form

      • simulate

        public void simulate()
        Call respective Algorithm handling methods based on currently selected algorithm Methods used for calculation are in PomozneMetode class when finished calls drawChart with the calculated data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
